channel.title: Brighton Kotlin
channel.description: The Brighton Kotlin group is for Kotlin users, enthusiasts and learners from beginners to experts, and anyone wanting to get involved with the Kotlin/JVM ecosystem.

item.title: Kotlin Multiplatform at HMRC By George Herbert
item.description: We are extremely lucky to have a talk this month by George Herbert from Capgemini where he will discuss how Kotlin Multiplatform (KMP) was implemented at HMRC

item.title: Successful Inaugural Brighton Kotlin Meetup
item.description: The first Brighton Kotlin Meetup was a great success

item.title: Lee Turner
item.description: Lee Turner is the founder of the Brighton Kotlin Meetup
